me.tatarka.ipromise

Class Deferred.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.tatarka.ipromise.Deferred.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Deferred<T>

    public static class Deferred.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder to configure and construct multiple deferreds. The Builder is immutable and all methods return a new instance. For now the callback executor is the only thing that you can configure.
    See Also:
    CallbackExecutors

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Constructs a new Builder
      Builder(Deferred.Builder builder)
      Constructs a new Builder that inherits from the given Builder.

      • withCallbackExecutor

        public static Deferred.Builder withCallbackExecutor(java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor)
        Constructs a new Builder with the given callback executor. This is a convenience method for new Deferred.Builder().callbackExecutor(executor).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the builder
